message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $90. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to get the best price possible.
I understand your concern about the price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $85. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $85. I'd be willing to pay $75 for the product. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.
I understand you're still looking for a better price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $82. It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with the deal.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still looking for a better price. I'm willing to pay $78 for the product. I think this is a fair price, and I'd be happy to make a deal at this point.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $80. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
